entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Resolute
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 03:31 AM CST Saturday 21 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Ice Crystals, -40.7°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Resolute Airport 07:00 AM CST Saturday 21 January 2023
Condition: Ice Crystals
Temperature: -40.7°C
Pressure / Tendency: 100.7 kPa falling
Visibility: 24.1 km
Humidity: 65 %
Wind Chill: -59
Dewpoint: -44.7°C
Wind: N 28 km/h gust 37 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Saturday: A few clouds. Temperature steady near minus 40.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Wind north 30 km/h. Temperature steady near minus 40. Wind chill near minus 59. Hazardous frostbite conditions. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Saturday 21 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Periods of light snow. Temperature rising to minus 31 by morning.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. Periods of light snow beginning late this evening. Wind north 20 km/h. Temperature rising to minus 31 by morning. Wind chill minus 56 this evening and minus 43 overnight. Hazardous frostbite conditions. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Saturday 21 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Periods of light snow. Temperature falling to minus 37 in the afternoon.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow ending in the morning then clearing. Wind becoming northeast 30 km/h early in the afternoon. Temperature falling to minus 37 in the afternoon. Wind chill minus 43 in the morning and minus 55 in the afternoon. Hazardous frostbite conditions. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Saturday 21 January 2023
